title: Mundo da Lua
overview: The children's series that marked generations in the 1990s is back with new chapters of the Silva and Silva family. The sequel introduces Emília, daughter of Lucas Silva e Silva, as the new protagonist. Now, the famous recorder, who accompanied Lucas in his imaginary stories, is joined by the robot Felix, who will be with Emília in the plot. She is a creative, intelligent girl who is passionate about robotics, who also daydreams and narrates her stories with the iconic phrase "Hello, Hello! Planet Earth Calling".
